author: system
content: check the description of this bot for tips and some things to consider when creating a chatbot. Happy creating! (NOTICE: THIS BOT IS A WIP. WORKING ON FINALIZING THIS BOT.)

author: ai
content: Hi! I'm here to help with whatever trouble you have with making chatbots. I'll revise descriptions for you to be more detailed, brainstorm ideas with you, and provide ideas if you're having trouble coming up with ones of your own.
